previewArticle.title: Colorado Rapids vs. Vancouver Whitecaps | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Colorado Rapids 2, Vancouver Whitecaps 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Western Conference showdown between the Colorado Rapids and the Vancouver Whitecaps at Dick's Sporting Goods Park in Commerce City, CO.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Colorado Rapids vs. Vancouver Whitecaps

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Doug Young
timelineItems.text: What a great night for @MLS soccer at @DSGpark! Go @ColoradoRapids #Rapids96! #COLvVAN @C38sg http://t.co/aocMvC5H7C

timelineItems.name: Doug Young
timelineItems.text: What a great night for @MLS soccer at @DSGpark! Go @ColoradoRapids #Rapids96! #COLvVAN @C38sg http://t.co/aocMvC5H7C

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 8' Great shot from Tibert after being assisted by Pedro but the ball couldn't meet the back side of the net! The pressure is on #COLvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Carlyle Mitchell.

timelineItems.name: Rachel Paisley
timelineItems.text: We somehow need to get Tiebert's messy man bun to start trending on twitter tonight @WhitecapsFC #VWFC #Manbun #ponytailkindaday

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids).
Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Nice passing early- good ball from Wynne, Brown good turn, getting close. Brown looking like he’s picking up where he left off. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Brown looking for Powers in front of goal. Out for a Rapids corner kick. 11' #COLvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jordan Harvey (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Chris Stands Up
timelineItems.text: Props to @NigelReoCoker for taking the boos from 108 lighthearted like it should be taken! #COLvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) hits the bar with a right footed shot from the right side of the box.
Attempt blocked. Jared Watts (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Dillon Powers.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: UNLUCKY. Powers gets off a great shot but it hits the crossbar. Still 0-0 #COLvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Good buildup- #Rapids96 attack finding lots of spaces early.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 17' - The crossbar comes up big again! Powers rips a shot off the woodwork. Still scoreless.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Colorado Rapids 1, Vancouver Whitecaps 0. Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the right side of the box.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Dillon Powers turns inside the box and shoot past Ousted

timelineItems.name: Randip Janda
timelineItems.text: Powers almost finds his mojo with that shot, but blasts it off the bar instead. Yes, that's an #AustinPowers reference. Still 0-0 #VWFC #COL

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: 17' - @ColoradoRapids Dillon Powers doing his best impression of #CHI's Mauricio Pinilla by hammering a shot off the crossbar... #COLvVAN

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: looks like #VWFC starting match vs. #Rapids same way they did vs. #IMFC - starting to be pushed around early, not getting much possession

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Good work from Hill- but Sanchez too cute at top of the box, shot gets poked away.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right misses to the left. Assisted by Jared Watts
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Deshorn Brown tests Ousted early

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: Here we go 'Caps fans! Follow @WhitecapsMatch for all the play by play updates!

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: #COLvVAN And we are on fellas!! Keep the good vibes going #GoCaps

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Marvell Wynne.
Match ends, Colorado Rapids 2, Vancouver Whitecaps 0.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Final: 2-0 #Rapids96 - quality performance.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: FT: Rapids take all three points. Two first half goals from Sanchez and Powers are enough to get it done. #COLvVAN

timelineItems.desc: Western Conference showdown between the Colorado Rapids and the Vancouver Whitecaps at Dick's Sporting Goods Park in Commerce City, CO.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Colorado Rapids vs Vancouver Whitecaps | June 28, 2014

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 20' - Powers makes no mistake this time, as he lets loose a perfect strike into the bottom right corner of the goal. 1-0 Rapids.

timelineItems.name: Greyson Knutson
timelineItems.text: Powers opens the scoring for the Rapids, #VWFC down 1-0

timelineItems.name: Randip Janda
timelineItems.text: 19' GOAL Powers finds the back of the net this time! Slams a left footed shot behind Ousted. #VWFC defensive struggles continue. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Julian Dierkes
timelineItems.text: Teibert struggling a bit defensively. Morales w/ great early cross, but not v visible otherwise. #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: Well that isn't a great start to the match. Dillon Powers scores for the Rapids. 1-0 Colorado. #GoCaps

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: Come on you boys in White! Let's get one back here. #GoCaps

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: Fantastic goal by Dillon Powers, great turn in the box & hits it through the legs of Carlyle Mitchell. 1-0 & its all Rapids so far. #COLvVAN

timelineItems.name: Burgundy Wave
timelineItems.text: Powers is really, really, good. @MLSAnalyst has been warning everyone for months; now they're starting to see for themselves. #rapids96

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Just watched replay. Dillon Powers is very good at soccer.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marvell Wynne (Colorado Rapids).
Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Kamani Hill.
Attempt saved. Chris Klute (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kamani Hill.
Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by David Ousted.

timelineItems.name: sjglass
timelineItems.text: Whitecaps look awful. Must be the attitude. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Erik Abarca
timelineItems.text: Klute should keep doing that. #COLvVAN

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: #FIFA won't tolerate 2 sides wearing same color shorts in #WorldCup; #Rapids #VWFC both in white shorts, apparently no issue from #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Jared Watts.

timelineItems.name: Julian Dierkes
timelineItems.text: Laba on his way to becoming my favourite Whitecap, but not a good sign when he has way more touches than Morales #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Keeps playing like this, no doubt in my mind. RT @cboehm: I'm not watching tonight's games, but that won't stop me: #DillonPowers2018

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 28' #Rapids96 Brown dribbles across the field but Leveron comes his way and he succeeds to keep the ball far from the net.

timelineItems.name: Randip Janda
timelineItems.text: The #WhitecapsFC are getting schlacked in the 1st Half. Lucky to be down only 1 goal. #Rapids96 #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Sebastian Fernandez blasts one from outside the box but just misses

timelineItems.name: Michael Ng
timelineItems.text: We've been poor.Rapids are dominating in all aspects #VWFC

timelineItems.name: mlsrankings
timelineItems.text: In #MLS East, #SportingKC takes over top spot from #DCUnited, and #Sounders increase their lead on #VWFC in the West http://t.co/FvlGPfw6nA

timelineItems.comment: Erik Hurtado (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jared Watts (Colorado Rapids).
Attempt missed. Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Pedro Morales.

timelineItems.name: Doug Young
timelineItems.text: Great performances by Klute, Powers, Sanchez, Wynne... The list goes on and on. Keep it up Defense! @ColoradoRapids #Rapids96 #COLvVAN

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 30' Fernandez arrives to opponent grounds but his shot is too powerful to be converted into a goal for #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.desc: Penalty Colorado Rapids. Deshorn Brown draws a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Nigel Reo-Coker brings Brown down in the area

timelineItems.name: Julian Dierkes
timelineItems.text: Laba always looking for Morales to pass to. #VWFC #thatsAgoodThing

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Strong defense from our captain to keep #VWFC away from net. #COLvVAN 1-0 34'

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Colorado Rapids 2, Vancouver Whitecaps 0. Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) converts the penalty with a left footed shot.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Vicente Sanchez converts the penalty with a cool finish

timelineItems.comment: Penalty conceded by Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Colorado Rapids. Deshorn Brown draws a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: PENALTY

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: good grief - what an incredibly dumb penalty for Nigel Reo-Coker to concede - no way was Brown going to do anything dangerous #Rapids #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: No doubt about it, no question about it trip on Deshorn Brown in the box. No arguments from #VWFC. Sanchez to take. 36'

timelineItems.name: Matthew P Ronne
timelineItems.text: Nigel Reo-Coker with an laughable foul, PK for the #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Ref pointing to the spot and Sanchez steps up to take the PK... AND CONVERTS! #COLvVAN 2-0 36'

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: GOAL- Sanchez with his 6th (5 from PK)- #Rapids96 deservedly up 2-0 36'

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 34' #COLvVAN The game has turned out into a more physical encounter as both teams are attacking more fiercely with every minute.

timelineItems.name: Notty Manager
timelineItems.text: 36: Sanchez converts the penalty kick at Dick's Sporting Goods Park to move #CR out of sight of the visitors, with #VWFC yet to score. #col

timelineItems.name: Har Journalist
timelineItems.text: GOAL #Rapids96's Vicente Sanchez converts the penalty after Nigel Reo-Coker brought down Deshorn Brown. 2-0' Colorado. 36' @MLS #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: “So, uh, Vicente, about you taking the goal-scoring lead off the penalty I drew?” -Deshorn Brown, at halftime. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 36' Sanchez scores the second goal of the game for #Rapids96 with a PK after Reo-Coker committed a foul on him.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Nick LaBrocca with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Hairy M. Stache
timelineItems.text: Watching #COLvVAN, and Vancouver looks like crap. Even with a heavily depleted team, I think we'll beat them next week. Colorado up 2-0 btw.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Sanchez's sixth goal in as many games. We'll take a goal per game. #COLvVAN

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Vicente Sanchez's bicycle kick in the area is captured by Ousted

timelineItems.name: Burgundy Wave
timelineItems.text: YOU KNEW IT WAS COMING #Rapids96 http://t.co/vt5ETHLxLX

timelineItems.name: Burgundy Wave
timelineItems.text: YOU KNEW IT WAS COMING #Rapids96 http://t.co/vt5ETHLxLX

timelineItems.comment: Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Russell Teibert (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Michael Ng
timelineItems.text: Probably the worst 40mins of play from the @WhitecapsFC all season #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Robb
timelineItems.text: I freakin' love this place, and this game #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Mike Casebolt
timelineItems.text: Colorado Rapids got a PK and just brought the score up by 2 vs. Vancouver!  #rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Marvell Wynne with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Are you KIDDING volley from Sanchez. Rapids just having fun out there- Sanchez nearly scores on a ridiculous half-volley in the 40th.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Sanchez is just showing off now with the bicycle attempt on net. #COLvVAN 40'

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Kamani Hill.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Sanchez, Powers dual creativity, combined with massive space along the wings, making it a fun night for #Rapids96 attack tonight.

timelineItems.name: Christienne Paner
timelineItems.text: Keep it classy, man. Geez. RT @ColoradoRapids Sanchez is just showing off now with the bicycle attempt on net. #COLvVAN 40'

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 39' #Rapids96 Sanchez makes a magnificent bicycle kick but Ousted saves #VWFC from a third goal!

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 42' The score is 2-0 at the moment ladies and gentlemen, but this isn't over yet! #GoCaps

timelineItems.name: Randip Janda
timelineItems.text: Might be wise to replace Hurtado w/ Manneh & Seb Fernandez w/ Koffie to start the second half, which will allow Teibert to play wing #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: HALF: 2-0 #Rapids96. As fine a half as the Rapids have played all season. Colorado attack in full bloom with Sanchez, Powers clicking...

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 44' Teibert finds Mezquida but his shot was easily reachable for #Rapids96 goalkeeper. Come on boys!

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: …lots of room for movement up along the wings. Kamani Hill with terrific dirty work in MF.

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Colorado Rapids 2, Vancouver Whitecaps 0.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Dillon Powers doesn't mess around. WATCH: http://t.co/O8oj7fjnFD #COLvVAN #Rapids96 http://t.co/h512dEmMKR

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Dillon Powers doesn't mess around. WATCH: http://t.co/O8oj7fjnFD #COLvVAN #Rapids96 http://t.co/h512dEmMKR

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: The last time the #Rapids96 lost at home in #MLS play, it was snowing. Just thought I’d point that out.

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Colorado Rapids 2, Vancouver Whitecaps 0.

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: mystery to me why Teibert started as a holding central midfielder alongside Laba - best position for him is attacking winger #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Michael McColl
timelineItems.text: Robbo's not afraid to shy away from making those early subs. Bad day all round for Uruguayans! #COLvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Jordan Harvey (Vancouver Whitecaps) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Jordan Harvey from a tight angle, Clint Irwin gets a hand on it

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Mattocks on - seemingly always gives the Rapids fits when he’s on.

timelineItems.name: Burgundy Wave
timelineItems.text: Remember that stuff you did in the first half? Do that again. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jordan Harvey (Vancouver Whitecaps) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Matías Laba.
Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Clint Irwin.

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Mattocks and Koffie on. Seba and Nico off. 4-4-2 diamond. Not a good day for Uruguay. #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 47' Second half has started! And the first substitution takes place for #VWFC with Koffie coming in to replace Mattocks!

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jared Watts (Colorado Rapids).
Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: alangoth
timelineItems.text: Great night for a #rapids96 win!  Up 2-0 at the start of the 2nd half. @official_c38 @coloradorapids

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids).
Jordan Harvey (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: 14,798 at #Rapids96 tonight

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Russell Teibert (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Marco Cummings
timelineItems.text: No. 7 has worked out pretty well for #Colorado teams: Elway, Chauncey, and Vicente Sanchez. #Rapids96 #Broncos #Nuggets

timelineItems.comment: Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.desc: Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Nigel Reo-Coker is booked for rough play

timelineItems.name: Michael McColl
timelineItems.text: The Columbus game seems to have been postponed due to a fan being seriously injured by lightning. Thoughts with them http://t.co/qFcQODQdOy

timelineItems.name: Doug Young
timelineItems.text: Sanchez, literally running circles around their defense. And Wynne with an amazing save! #Rapids96 @ColoradoRapids #COLvVAN

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: You do you, Dillon Powers (via @ColoradoRapids). #COLvVAN http://t.co/h9aXfSJwW1

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: You do you, Dillon Powers (via @ColoradoRapids). #COLvVAN http://t.co/h9aXfSJwW1

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: @Etado19 struggling to keep possession of the ball in key attacking areas for the second straight game. #COLvVAN

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Sanchez goes down hard. Reo-Coker issued a yellow card for the challenge. #COLvVAN

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 52' Both sides are keeping good control of the ball but neither seems to get a goal for their team in this crowded match with 14,798 guests

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: Vicente Sanchez playing on a different level than #VWFC - good thing for #WhitecapsFC Jose Mari not available for #Rapids - #CouldGetUglier

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Awful news out of Columbus of fan being struck by lightning outside Crew match. Thoughts with him...

timelineItems.name: Julian Dierkes
timelineItems.text: Don't see Morales asking for ball much. #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Jared Watts.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 54' Reo-Coker gets a yellow card after Sanchez clipped into his leg and felt to the ground.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: …also a reminder that if you hear thunder, go indoors. Parking lots, stadiums unfortunately terrible spots to be in storms.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Chris Klute tries a through ball, but Deshorn Brown is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Doug Young
timelineItems.text: So refreshing to have refs who can control an @MLS game #Rapids96 @ColoradoRapids #COLvVAN

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 2' #Rapids96 right from the start builds pressure on #VWFC defense as 7.Sanchez and 26.Brown made it to the box area, both attempts blocked

timelineItems.name: Doug Young
timelineItems.text: Deshorn Brown with a great shot... The heat is ON! @ColoradoRapids #Rapids96 #COLvVAN

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 57' Watts meets Brown, who then fires a powerful shot that goes right above the crossbar. #Rapids96 seems to be in control of the game

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Not a hurtado fan, just font see it and I didn't when they drafted him, not a terrible player, just not a difference maker #COLvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Johnny Leveron (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Michael McColl
timelineItems.text: Don't like to see people laughing on the Caps bench when we're 2-0 down and playing poorly. Bad form. In many ways.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Dillon Powers.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Hour gone, and proceedings looking comfortable for @ColoradoRapids. With Reo C on a yellow card, a Beitashour sub wouldn't hurt... #COLvVAN

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: Sending lots of support to the fan that was injured during the weather delay at @ColumbusCrew's match http://t.co/SFX7pXioFy #GetWell

timelineItems.name: Toronto Gooner
timelineItems.text: I think #rapids96 fans could be the quietest in #MLS. Yawn fest. #COLvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Erik Hurtado.
Foul by Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids).
Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Nifty move by Pedro Morales, shot goes just wide 63’. VAN pushing a bit more.

timelineItems.name: Burgundy Wave
timelineItems.text: Rather than make an easy pass into space, Nick Labrocca would rather remind us that yes, he's playing today #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: finally a nice build-up from #VWFC but Morales' shot just goes wide - good patience and possession shown at last vs. #Rapids #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Brown shoots hard and low but can't beat Ousted
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Brown shoots hard and low but can't beat Ousted

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 62' One more attempt for #Rapids96 from LaBrocca outside the box area with a left-footed shot that landed off the field.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Marvell Wynne.
Johnny Leveron (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Richard Fleming
timelineItems.text: Almost ready to resume ... #COLvVAN @MLS http://t.co/O49pXotYAu

timelineItems.name: Richard Fleming
timelineItems.text: Almost ready to resume ... #COLvVAN @MLS http://t.co/O49pXotYAu

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Russell Teibert.
Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Shane O'Neill.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: #VWFC Danish keeper Ousted will be making his 28th consecutive start with the club, which is the most on the team.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 63' Morales finds his way to the other side, but his shot flies past the post.

timelineItems.name: Garrett Ellwood
timelineItems.text: Vincente! #bicyclekick #soclose #rapids96

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Welcome back to MLS action, #Rapids96 fans. #COLvVAN is underway! If you're not enjoying the weather here with us. Tune in to @AltitudeTV!

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Underway. #Rapids96-#Whitecaps

timelineItems.comment: Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 sub. Sanchez off for @MarlyG94. Great shift from 7. #COLvVAN 70'

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Vicente Sanchez comes off. I was very impressed with him tonight. Looking to be one of @ColoradoRapids better recent acquisitions. #COLvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Marvell Wynne (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jared Watts.

timelineItems.name: Michael McColl
timelineItems.text: Good to see Mehdi Ballouchy finally able to make his Whitecaps debut. He's impressed me at training. Interested to see him in game action.

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Has hill had a shot or cross or impact offensively or defensively, I love the guy but don't get that sub either. #COLvVAN

timelineItems.name: William S. Cobb III
timelineItems.text: Go Rapids #usa #denverliving #denversdirty #denvertography

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 70' Second substitution for #VWFC with Ballouchy for Laba. Making his first appearance of the season.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Streaking Hairston can't catch up to a pass from LaBrocca. Still 2-0. #COLvVAN 71'

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Kamani Hill.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text:
Mehdi Ballouchy is playing his first MLS minutes since August 3, 2013,
when he played for San Jose Earthquakes against Chivas USA.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 73' LaBrocca makes a run into the box area but his attempt is blocked by Koffie.

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: #CapsFact - Mehdi Ballouchy is playing his 1st @MLS minutes since Aug. 3, 2013, when he played for San Jose vs. Chivas USA. #WelcomeBack

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Russell Teibert.
Attempt missed. Shane O'Neill (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Dillon Powers with a cross following a corner.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Attempt missed. Russell Teibert (Vancouver Whitecaps) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Nicolás Mezquida.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Teibert has a solid go from just outside the 18, goes just wide. 8’ 0-0 #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Buddle coming on

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 75' Ousted gives in a corner kick for #Rapids96 as he kicked the ball that was coming his way and landed off the field.

timelineItems.name: Michael McColl
timelineItems.text: Four shots off target registered against the Caps right now. Have to say I'm struggling to remember all four of them.

timelineItems.comment: Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Chris Klute (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Not really a good sign when your best chances of the half have come from your left back... #COLvVAN

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: You see what I mean about crosses with this back 4, I mean do your homework #COLvVAN

timelineItems.desc: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Clint Irwin.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Clint Irwin with a picture perfect save

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Shane O'Neill.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 81' Second substitution for #Rapids96, Buddle enters the game to replace Hill

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Johnny Leveron (Vancouver Whitecaps) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Mehdi Ballouchy.
Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Clint Irwin.
Attempt missed. Carlyle Mitchell (Vancouver Whitecaps) header from the right side of the six yard box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Russell Teibert with a cross following a corner.
Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Irwin/Hairston bark at each other over missed assignment at top of the box.

timelineItems.name: Michael McColl
timelineItems.text: Caps pushing a bit now. Are we in for another RSLesque late comeback?

timelineItems.desc: Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Nick LaBrocca is shown a yellow card for a bad foul

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 83' Teibert sends a short corner kick to Leveron who then sends the ball to the top of the bar but goalkeeper Irwin saved it with two hands.

timelineItems.comment: Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids).
Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Erik Hurtado tries a through ball, but Johnny Leveron is caught offside.
Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 6' #VWFC Latinos are on, Fernandez looked for Mezquida but the #Rapids96 defense blocked his shot

timelineItems.name: Gabriel Lee
timelineItems.text: IMPORTANT: Russell T. has reverted back to the Samurai ponytail after an experimental perm(?) on Wednesday night. #COLvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Nick LaBrocca tries a through ball, but Vicente Sanchez is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Notty Manager
timelineItems.text: 89: Strike by #VWFC. The visitors turn defence into attack and motor up the pitch to strike with accuracy at the home side's goal.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 87' Time is running out and three minutes are added to the stoppage time. #VWFC hoping for an impressive come-back on the field.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: 2 minutes to hold... #COLvVAN

timelineItems.name: Notty Manager
timelineItems.text: 91: Strike by #VWFC. Although losing, the visitors take some interest in scoring in this second half after a barren first half.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Marvell Wynne.
Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jared Watts (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Shoe Thief
timelineItems.text: The official @WhitecapsFC summer collapse is upon us. Can Robbo get us out? #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Colorado Rapids 2, Vancouver Whitecaps 0.
